:::Jetstorm/Sharpedge:::

::Jetstorm's wing tips get damged, but he can still fly.  He fires 25 energy 
blasts and 5 optic blasts at Nemises Enfrocer.  Sharpedge takes out his sword 
and tries to thrust it into Scattershots chest::
